# Krishnanand Anil - Senior Data Engineer

> Senior Data Engineer with 5+ years of experience specializing in real-time data pipelines, AWS Cloud services, and enterprise-grade data solutions. Expert in building scalable CDC pipelines processing 50M+ events daily, data warehouses with sub-second query performance, and AI-ready analytics platforms. Currently leading data engineering initiatives at DTDC Express Limited.

Senior Data Engineer architecting real-time streaming systems, data warehouses, and AI-ready analytics platforms. Proven track record of improving data accuracy from 60% to 98%, reducing latency by 99%, and cutting manual reporting efforts by 80%. Specializes in Apache Kafka, AWS Cloud, Python, and modern data stack technologies.

## About

- [Home](https://krishnanandanil.com): Portfolio homepage with overview and featured work

- [Contact](https://krishnanandanil.com/contact): Get in touch for opportunities and collaborations

## Featured Projects

- [Real-Time Tracking Data Platform](https://krishnanandanil.com/projects/realtime-tracking-platform): Event-driven streaming pipeline processing 50M+ tracking events daily with sub-second latency
- [Enterprise Data Warehouse](https://krishnanandanil.com/projects/enterprise-data-warehouse): Unified Finance & Business analytics with automated ETL/ELT workflows reducing manual reporting by 80%
- [AI-Ready Analytics Platform](https://krishnanandanil.com/projects/ai-analytics-platform): GenAI-powered analytics with vector search and natural language querying, reducing time-to-insight by 70%
- [Real-Time CDC Pipeline](https://krishnanandanil.com/projects/realtime-cdc-pipeline): Production CDC pipeline using Kafka, Debezium, and custom Python consumers handling 100K+ events per minute

## All Projects

- [Medallion Data Lake Architecture](https://krishnanandanil.com/projects/medallion-data-lake): Multi-zone data lake with bronze, silver, and gold zones processing 5TB+ monthly
- [Projects Listing](https://krishnanandanil.com/projects): Complete portfolio of data engineering projects

## Technical Writing

- [Building Production-Grade Real-Time CDC Pipelines](https://krishnanandanil.com/blog/realtime-cdc-patterns-kafka-debezium): Architecture patterns and lessons learned from processing 50M+ events daily
- [Optimizing Apache Spark Jobs for Production](https://krishnanandanil.com/blog/optimizing-apache-spark-performance): Comprehensive guide to tuning Spark configurations for 40% performance improvement
- [Amazon Redshift Optimization Guide](https://krishnanandanil.com/blog/amazon-redshift-optimization-guide): Best practices for improving query accuracy from 60% to 98%
- [Blog Listing](https://krishnanandanil.com/blog): Technical articles on data engineering, AWS, and big data

## Professional Experience

- [DTDC Express Limited](https://www.dtdc.in/): Current - Senior Data Engineer leading real-time data initiatives processing 50M+ events daily
- [Quantiphi Analytics Solutions](https://www.quantiphi.com/): Senior Data Engineer (Feb 2024 - Nov 2024) building high-performance data pipelines
- [Cognizant Technology Solutions](https://www.cognizant.com/): Associate (Aug 2020 - Feb 2024) designing medallion architecture and multi-tenant systems

## Technical Skills

Real-Time CDC Pipelines (50M+ events/day), Apache Kafka & Debezium, AWS Cloud Architecture (Lambda, Glue, EMR, Redshift, Kinesis, S3), Amazon Redshift Optimization, Python & Go Development, Data Warehouse Design, Vector Databases & AI Analytics, Kubernetes & Docker, Apache Airflow, DBT, PySpark, Data Modeling, ETL/ELT, GraphQL APIs, PostgreSQL, MongoDB, Terraform, CI/CD

## Key Achievements

Reduced data latency by 99% (3 hours â†’ seconds) with real-time CDC pipelines. Improved report accuracy from 60% to 98% through advanced validation. Cut manual reporting effort by 80% with automated ETL workflows. Reduced time-to-insight by 70% with AI-ready analytics platform. Built systems processing 50M+ tracking events daily. Achieved 20% efficiency improvement through CI/CD automation.
